EmailTemplate.name: YETI Credit Application
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Per your request an application is attached for credit with YETI Coolers.
Please be sure to include Fax #'s for all references (or email addresses if preferred), as this will be our mode of contact.
Credit decisions may take several weeks, dependent on timeliness of feedback from references.
Please let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you.
{!User.CommunityNickname} Account Management Team YETI 512.394.0222 sales@yeti.com yeti.com
